name: TheBeach
description:
This is a prototype that is trying to investigate the "interactive poetry". It has been done in 4 days.

You have to play by pressing Z and X button when the feet of your character touches the ground. If you want to pay attention to the thoughts, just press up arrow. If you want to stand up, spam the Z button.

I'm Aiden, and I'm developing alone. I hope the game makes you think and meditate about the symbolism. Feedback is welcome! It's not really finished, but it's a nice prototype.
